other_tests.findings: The liver is diffusely echogenic, consistent with hepatic steatosis. No focal liver mass. Hepatopetal flow in the main portal vein. No ascites. No intrahepatic biliary dilation. CBD measures 4 mm. Sludge and tiny stones in the gallbladder. Gallbladder polyps, measuring up to 1.0 cm, are unchanged. The imaged portion of the pancreas appears normal, with no masses or ductal dilation.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Gallbladder polyps measuring up to 1.0 cm are unchanged.
